titleStmt.title: The dressing up of the crown. In a sermon preached at St. Edmunds Bury in Suffolk, May 17. 1660. When His Majestie was there solemnly proclaimed King of England, &c. By Laurence Womock.
titleStmt.author: Womock, Laurence, 1612-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by W.H. for Will. Sheares at the blew Bible in Bedford street in Covent Garden,

notesStmt.note: The final leaf contains two lines of errata.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the blew Bible in Bedford street in Covent Garden
